metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10895 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Wireshark 2.4.0 to 2.4.13, 2.6.0 to 2.6.7, and 3.0.0, the NetScaler file parser could crash. This was addressed in wiretap/netscaler.c by improving data validation.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-10895` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 2.6.8-1
libwireshark14 - 2.6.8-1
libwiretap11 - 2.6.8-1
libwsutil12 - 2.6.8-1
tshark - 2.6.8-1
wireshark - 2.6.8-1
wireshark-common - 2.6.8-1
wireshark-gtk - 2.6.8-1
wireshark-qt - 2.6.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.8-1').
